Description: 2017 Gibson Les Paul Studio Tribute Satin Gold Top w/ HSC 2017 Gibson Les Paul Studio Tribute Satin Gold Top w/ HSC To guitarists everywhere, the Les Paul's appeal is magnetic with its seductive looks, sensuous playability, and timeless tone. Now you can get all these with some great modern features for not a lot of dough in the Gibson Les Paul Tribute. The Tribute's satin-finished mahogany/maple body offers up plenty of warmth and sustain, and its SlimTaper mahogany neck honors a style beloved throughout the ages. And Keystone tuners and modern Gold Top Hat knobs offer the charms of a vintage instrument without the cost. Pair these with a set of vintage-style humbuckers, and you've got a guitar that's fine enough to be your daily driver, yet affordable enough to be your weekend warrior: the Gibson Les Paul Tribute. This guitar is in excellent overall condition showing just a small spot of belt buckle rash on the back. It has great action and all of the fat, LP tone you would expect. Includes non-original hardshell case.  Ryan Fowler's Guitar Experience is one of Maryland's premier brick and mortar guitar shops. We specialize in unique and hard to find guitars, basses, amplifiers and effect pedals. Please message us with any questions. We will respond to most questions within 24 hours or less! We are an authorized dealer for a number of brands including Paul Reed Smith, Nash, Suhr, Guild, Ibanez, Reverend, East Amplification, Vox, Headrush, Catalinbread, MXR, Electro Harmonix, JHS Pedals, Korg, Earthquaker Devices, Walrus Audio, Strymon, Seagull, Emerson Custom, Mono Bags, One Control, Cordoba, SKB Cases, Alto Professional, Dunlop, Ernie Ball and many, many more!
